text: Arau enekuraa bahuto nabi achila, yisakalara lagata thaki bahu sankhyaka (imana arau amale chalehara oparata prasiksana praapta) loka yud'dha karaiche. Allahara pathata te'omlokara yi biparyaya ghatichila tata te'omloka manobala herauraa nachila, durbala'o horaa nachila arau nata horaa nachila; arau allaha dhairyasilasakalaka bhala paya
